title: Ticket #2359: nordugrid_gahp missing from Debian builds
description:
The nordugrid_gahp binary is missing from our Debian releases. This is because the nmi debian machines don't have the ldap development package installed. Our build scripts skip building nordugrid_gahp in this case.

[nmi-support #9644] requests installing package libldap2-dev on the nmi build machines. We should also make the build fail if ldap is missing on a linux machine.
remarks:
2011-Aug-05 17:09:37 by jfrey:
The nordugrid_gahp is needed for both nordugrid and cream jobs.

2011-Aug-15 11:44:36 by jfrey:
The required ldap packages are now present on x86_deb_5.0 and x86_64_deb_6.0-updated. They are still missing on x86_64_deb_5.0.

2011-Aug-22 16:45:51 by tannenba:
ldap package still missing from NMI on x86_64_deb_5.0, thus this patch missed the v7.6.3 release and will be targeted for v7.6.4.

2011-Sep-16 11:28:08 by jfrey:
Actually, the ldap package on x86_64_deb_5.0 in NMI was installed soon enough for the nordugrid_gahp to be present in all debian packages for 7.6.3.
creator: jfrey
